tachyon.metrics

Class MetricsConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.metrics.MetricsConfig

  • public final class MetricsConfig
extends Object
    Configurations used by the metrics system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MetricsConfig(Properties properties)
      Creates a new MetricsConfig using the given Properties.
      MetricsConfig(String configFile)
      Creates a new MetricsConfig using the given config file.

      Gets properties for the given instance.

      Gets the property categories, used by unit tests only.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetricsConfig

        public MetricsConfig(String configFile)
        Creates a new MetricsConfig using the given config file.

        configFile - config file to use

      • MetricsConfig

        Creates a new MetricsConfig using the given Properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstanceProperties

        public Properties getInstanceProperties(String inst)
        Gets properties for the given instance.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance name. Currently there are only two instances: "master" and "worker"
        Returns:
        the instance's properties if it is present, otherwise a default one is returned

      • getPropertyCategories

        public Map<String,Properties> getPropertyCategories()
        Gets the property categories, used by unit tests only.
        Returns:
        a Map that maps from instance name to its properties

      • subProperties

        public Map<String,Properties> subProperties(Properties prop,
                                            String regex)
        Uses regex to parse every original property key to a prefix and a suffix. Creates sub properties that are grouped by the prefix.
        Parameters:
        prop - the original properties
        regex - specifies the prefix and suffix pattern
        Returns:
        a Map maps from the prefix to its properties
